body:
**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?**:
/no

**What happened**:

After starting kube-controller-manager, get the following log:
/-------
W0712 06:40:45.824073       1 controllermanager.go:449] Unsuccessful parsing of cluster CIDR : invalid CIDR address: 
W0712 06:40:45.824133       1 controllermanager.go:453] Unsuccessful parsing of service CIDR : invalid CIDR address: 
I0712 06:40:45.824600       1 nodecontroller.go:219] Sending events to api server.
I0712 06:40:45.824852       1 taint_controller.go:157] Sending events to api server.
W0712 06:40:45.910839       1 controllermanager.go:506] Unsuccessful parsing of cluster CIDR : invalid CIDR address: 
I0712 06:40:45.911007       1 controllermanager.go:519] Will not configure cloud provider routes for allocate-node-cidrs: false, configure-cloud-routes: true.
I0712 06:40:45.911187       1 servicecontroller.go:177] Starting service controller
/-------
and 
/-------
I0717 07:52:58.773241       1 nodecontroller.go:612] Initializing eviction metric for zone: 
I0717 07:52:58.773314       1 nodecontroller.go:612] Initializing eviction metric for zone: RegionOne::nova
W0717 07:52:58.773427       1 nodecontroller.go:947] Missing timestamp for Node pf-xth6u2xkdj-0-mjceutibsx4b-kube-master-2hudxvu6qepc. Assuming now as a timestamp.
W0717 07:52:58.773507       1 nodecontroller.go:947] Missing timestamp for Node pf-2ctn6igely-0-n7ljyvt2zsbx-kube-minion-hai7y6xncuqi. Assuming now as a timestamp.
I0717 07:52:58.773912       1 nodecontroller.go:863] NodeController detected that zone  is now in state Normal.
I0717 07:52:58.773948       1 nodecontroller.go:863] NodeController detected that zone RegionOne::nova is now in state Normal.
/----------

**What you expected to happen**:
Friendly log will be output

**How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)**:
start controller manager service.

**Anything else we need to know?**:

**Environment**:
- Kubernetes version (use `kubectl version`):  v1.6.4
- Cloud provider or hardware configuration**:
- OS (e.g. from /etc/os-release):
- Kernel (e.g. `uname -a`):
- Install tools:
- Others:

labels.name: needs-sig

title: Ouput some strange log when starting kube-controller-manager
